title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Get out there and roar until you are noticed. Capturing the attention of that one person from whom you crave recognition might be hurried along by leaving a trail of breadcrumbs behind wherever you go today. Whether you are hoping for romance, a job opportunity, or a big breakthrough in your field of interest, it cannot hurt to generate a positive buzz. Throw in a heavy dose of your exuberant Leonine charm, and prospects for success are looking better than ever. Fortune favors the bold. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
